snippet: The agreement to hold elections in April was announced after eight hours of negotiations. The government has been under fire for months over a wiretapping scandal.
abstract: Macedonia will hold early elections in April 2016 under tentative agreement to mediate political crisis.
lead_paragraph: The agreement to hold elections in April was announced after eight hours of negotiations. The government has been under fire for months over a wiretapping scandal.

headline.main: Macedonia to Hold Early Elections Amid Political Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Europe; Macedonia: Elections to Be Moved Up
